msbt.message: You ever just casually stop in a store and end up falling in love with something? And then you have to buy it.<10_4 /> , it's the only way to shop!

Sometimes it's harder to shop in a store with a better selection, you know? Like, I went to this designer shop once and there was just one hat for sale. I'm likeI guess I'm buying that hat!<10_4 /> It was 40,000 Bells, but I think it was a good decision.
Don't mind meI'm just in my happy place.I could shop all day if it weren't for all the pesky non-shopping activities required by life.
